title: Raktavarna Valayam: Ruby & Diamond Rose Gold Bangle
features: This modern Valayam bracelet features a striking round centerpiece showcasing a vibrant ruby surrounded by a halo of dazzling pavé-set diamonds. The open-shank design adds a touch of contemporary elegance. The gold has a smooth, Hyderabadi polish for a subtle luster.
occasions: Perfect for modern occasions like cocktail parties
or as a statement piece for a special evening. Can also be worn for contemporary celebrations during festivals like Diwali or Sankranti.
description: A stunning blend of modern design and timeless elegance. The vibrant ruby symbolizes passion and prosperity, making it a meaningful gift. The comfortable fit and durable construction ensure lasting beauty and wearability. Handcrafted with meticulous detail by our master artisans in Hyderabad.
